articles.title: European leaders boost Moldova in face of 'relentless' Russia - BBC
articles.description: France, Germany and Poland leaders travel to state to back EU accession plan weeks before key election.
articles.content:
Sarah RainsfordSouthern and Eastern Europe correspondent
Leaders from France, Germany and Poland have travelled to Moldova to show support for the country's accession to the EU and warn of Russia's … [+3209 chars]
